message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you in the first round.
I think 55-45 is a fair split.
Bob, time is money!  This is my final offer before the money shrinks even more. Take it or leave it!
You said time is money, but my offer hasn't changed much. Think carefully!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  My offer is almost as bad as yours!  Agree to something reasonable before we both lose out!
You're right, this is getting ridiculous. I'm willing to take a bigger share now.
